mapper.select: SELECT A.MBER_NM , A.GRADE_CODE , B.NCNM , B.OCCP_CODE , B.EXP , B.LEVEL , D.GUILD_NM , A.SEXDSTN , D.GRADE , D.CLA , FN_GET_CODE_NM('OCCP', B.OCCP_CODE) as OCCP_NM , B.POINT FROM MBER_INFO A INNER JOIN AVATAR_INFO B ON A.MBER_SN = B.MBER_SN INNER JOIN GUILD_MBER_LIST C ON A.MBER_SN = C.MBER_SN INNER JOIN GUILD_INFO D ON C.GUILD_SN = D.GUILD_SN WHERE A.MBER_SN = #{mberId} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
